# CapturedStructure

**Structure**

An object that holds the results of the merger of multiple capture sessions.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CapturedStructure
```

## Overview

This structure combines the data from multiple [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom] instances that a user scans in the same physical vicinity. The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/StructureBuilder] class’s function merges the captured rooms with the [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/StructureBuilder/capturedStructure(from:)] function, which returns an object of this type.

## Creating a captured room

- **init(from:)**: Creates a captured structure by deserializing the decoder of a prior captured structure.

## Inspecting structure details

- **identifier**: A unique alphanumeric value that the framework assigns the structure.
- **rooms**: An array of all the captured rooms in the structure.
- **floors**: An array of all the floors in the structure.
- **CapturedStructure.Surface**: The type a captured structure assigns to surfaces.
- **doors**: An array of all the doors in the structure.
- **objects**: An array of all the objects in the structure.
- **CapturedStructure.Object**: The type a captured structure assigns to objects.
- **openings**: An array of all the openings in the structure.
- **walls**: An array of all the walls in the structure.
- **windows**: An array of all the windows in the structure.
- **sections**: One or more room types that the framework identifies in the structure.
- **CapturedStructure.Section**: The type a captured structure assigns to distinct room areas.
- **version**: A version number for the captured structure.

## Serializing a captured structure

- **encode(to:)**: Serializes a captured structure to the specified encoder.

## Generating a USDZ file

- **export(to:metadataURL:modelProvider:exportOptions:)**: Produces a 3D asset from the captured structure.
- **CapturedStructure.USDExportOptions**: The type a captured structure uses to configure exports.
- **CapturedStructure.ModelProvider**: The type a captured structure uses to output sophisticated 3D models.

## Handling errors

- **CapturedStructure.Error**: Errors that can occur during a captured structure export.

## Captured Data

- **Merging multiple scans into a single structure**: Export a 3D model that consists of multiple rooms captured in the same physical vicinity.
- **Scanning the rooms of a single structure**: Create an AR experience that enables people to scan a building that contains multiple rooms.
- **CapturedRoom**: A structure that provides the key details of a scanned room.
- **CapturedRoomData**: An opaque object that holds the raw results of a scan.
- **Captured Object Attributes**: Determine details about the objects and surfaces that the framework identifies in a scan.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
